title: Preventing Ocean Plastics | The Pew Charitable Trusts
body: Plastic pollution is a pervasive global problem intertwined with every aspect of human life. The Pew Charitable Trusts' 2020 report "Breaking the Plastic Wave," for which the University of Oxford was a thought partner, found that without action the amount of plastic entering the ocean could triple to 29 million metric tons per year by 2040.
